snippet.title: Second Sun - Gameplay Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Second Sun on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2085620/Second_Sun/

Second Sun is a Hi-octane FPS with RPG elements, set in an open world, filled with intriguing landmarks, procedurally generated dungeons and tons of loot! Explore a vast, picturesque map and use your supernatural abilities to save the Empire from devastation and prevent the world from falling into darkness.

Stay up to date with Second Sun and Iceberg Interactive: 

Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/iceberginteractive

Twitter:
http://twitter.com/Iceberg_Int

Discord: http://discord.gg/iceberginteractive
Discord: https://discord.gg/H76FHQzR
Steam publisher page: http://bit.ly/IcebergOnSteam
